name: Victini
author: 5ban Graphics
flavor_text: This Pokémon brings victory. It is said that Trainers with Victini always win, regardless of the type of encounter.

abilities.name: Victory Star
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, after you flip any coins for an attack, you may ignore all effects of those coin flips and begin flipping those coins again. You can’t use more than 1 Victory Star Ability each turn.

attacks.name: Stored Power
attacks.effect: Move all Energy attached to this Pokémon to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
